Package com._2_ug_1.cacyno.services

Interface IGameService

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameService
public interface IGameService
handels logic for poker and updates database accordingly

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteById​(java.lang.String id)
    deletes a game specified by id from the database
    java.util.List<Game> findAll()
    returns all games from the database as a list
    Game findById​(java.lang.String id)
    gets the game with the specified id
    Game gameInit​(java.lang.String gameId)
    sets up a game so that user may make play calls in a preditable way.
    Game play​(java.lang.String gameId, java.lang.String userId, int bet)
    The user with id equal to userId will attempt to make a play on the game with an id equal to gameId.
    Game save​(Game game)
    Add a new game to the database

  • Method Details

    • save

      Game save​(Game game)
      Add a new game to the database
      Parameters:
      game - the game to be added to the database
      Returns:
      the game added to the database

    • findAll

      java.util.List<Game> findAll()
      returns all games from the database as a list
      Returns:
      list of all games from the database

    • findById

      Game findById​(java.lang.String id)
      gets the game with the specified id
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the requested id
      Returns:
      a game that has the same id as specified

    • deleteById

      void deleteById​(java.lang.String id)
      deletes a game specified by id from the database
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the game to be deleted

    • gameInit

      Game gameInit​(java.lang.String gameId)
      sets up a game so that user may make play calls in a preditable way. Resets values for the game and users in game and deals cards.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the id of the game to be initialized
      Returns:
      the updated game, Returns nothing if no game is found

    • play

      Game play​(java.lang.String gameId, java.lang.String userId, int bet)
      The user with id equal to userId will attempt to make a play on the game with an id equal to gameId. The user will only be able to make a play if it is their turn. At the end of the last round, when the last player ends their turn the end game sequence begins.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the Id of the game the user is attempting to play on
      userId - the Id of the user in the game attempting to make a play
      bet - Determins the play the user will make in the game. Bet less than 0: the user will fold, Bet equals 0: the user will check, Bet greater than 0 and valid: the user will spend some of their in game money to bet.
      Returns:
      the updated game if the user is in the game, it is their turn and they made a valid bet, if the game is not found, user is not found, or move is invalid then it will return null
